data.name: Cinema Tickets Booking App
data.description:
It's implemented to provide a seamless and efficient way to book movie tickets. This app is built using 𝗙𝗹𝘂𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗿 and 𝗗𝗷𝗮𝗻𝗴𝗼 for the backend, and a host of features aimed at delivering the best movie experience right at your fingertips. Whether you’re browsing showtimes or securing tickets, this app brings convenience to the forefront.

Key Features:

✅ 𝗩𝗶𝗲𝘄 𝗠𝗼𝘃𝗶𝗲𝘀:
Browse through a wide selection of movies, including currently playing 
      films, upcoming releases, and showtimes. All the movie details you need 
      are easily accessible.

✅ 𝗔𝗱𝗱 𝘁𝗼 𝗕𝗼𝗼𝗸𝗺𝗮𝗿𝗸𝘀:
Save your favorite movies to your bookmarks for quick and easy access 
      later. This feature makes it simple to revisit movies you want to check out 
      in the future.

✅ 𝗕𝗼𝗼𝗸𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗧𝗶𝗰𝗸𝗲𝘁𝘀:
The app makes booking tickets fast and easy. Choose a movie, select a 
      showtime, pick your seats, and complete the booking process with just a 
      few taps.

✅ 𝗣𝗮𝘆𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗜𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗴𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻:
The app supports secure payment methods, allowing users to book    tickets effortlessly and securely.

✅ 𝗦𝗵𝗼𝘄𝘁𝗶𝗺𝗲𝘀 & 𝗦𝗲𝗮𝘁 𝗦𝗲𝗹𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻:
Check out available showtimes and select seats according to your 
      preference, whether it's for a solo movie date, a cozy couple’s night, or a 
      group outing.

data.name: CORHEMA
data.description:
An innovative project that bridges the gap between patients and doctors, offering seamless communication across Android and Desktop platforms. 

Our solution simplifies healthcare interactions with minimal effort, ensuring an efficient user experience.

Key Features:

Real-Time Appointment Scheduling: Book and manage appointments effortlessly.

Alzheimer's Disease Detection: AI-powered system for early detection of Alzheimer's disease.

Electronic Prescriptions: Streamline the prescription process digitally.

Online Consultation: Consult with doctors from the comfort of your home.

Secure Payment Integration: Safe and reliable payment methods for medical services.

Doctor & Hospital Reviews: Share your experiences to help others make informed decisions.

Favorites: Easily access your preferred doctors and hospitals for future visits.

Technologies Used: Figma for UI/UX design GetX for state management Flutter & Dart for cross-platform development Node.js, Express, MongoDB for backend development Paymob for secure payment integration GetStorage & Shared Preferences for local storage Local Notifications for appointment and reminder alerts.

CNN (Convolutional Neural Networks) for Alzheimer’s Disease detection through deep learning

A big thank you to my friends and teammates for their amazing collaboration and support throughout this journey!

data.name: Animated Social Media App UI
data.description: Animated Social Media App User Interface

data.name: Tickets Booking App
data.description:
Excited to introduce our Ticket Booking App!

It allows users to effortlessly book flights and hotel rooms, review options, and save their favorite hotels for easy future access.

Built using Node.js, Flutter, and Dart, it provides a seamless experience with:

Flight Bookings
Hotel Room Reservations
Flight and Hotel Reviews
Favorites for Hotels (for easy future access)

Key features include:

State Management using Provider
Localization for a personalized user experience
Push Notifications to keep users updated
Secure Payment Integration for hassle-free transactions

Our app aims to make your travel planning easier and more enjoyable with its intuitive interface and powerful features.

data.name: Task Reminder App
data.description:
developed using GetX and GetStorage, offers streamlined task
management experience. Users can easily add tasks, set reminders, and receive
notifications upon task completion. The app utilizes GetStorage for efficient local data
storage, allowing users to archive and manage their tasks seamlessly. With GetX, tasks can
be categorized into lists, modified, canceled, or deleted with intuitive user interactions,
ensuring a smooth and responsive user experience.

data.name: E-Commerce App
data.description:
is designed to enhance your shopping experience. Users can shop for
a wide range of products, add items to their favorites, archive products for future reference,
and browse through an extensive catalog effortlessly. Enjoy a seamless and convenient
shopping journey with our intuitive app.

data.name: Todo App
data.description:
helps users efficiently manage their tasks with support for both light and
dark themes. Users can list tasks for future completion, receive notifications when tasks
are done, and add completed tasks to a done list. Additionally, tasks can be archived for
future reference. The app is built using SQFlite, ensuring reliable and efficient data storage
and management.

data.name: Watch-Store_3d_App-UI
data.description: The 3D Watch Store app UI offers an immersive shopping experience, allowing users to view watches in stunning 3D. Users can customize their selection by exploring various colors and sizes, ensuring a perfect fit for their style. Intuitive navigation and interactive features make it easy to compare options and visualize their ideal watch before purchase.

data.name: Calorie-Tracker-App-3D-UI
data.description: The Animated Calorie Tracker app UI blends functionality with engaging visuals, making calorie tracking enjoyable. With a dynamic and interactive food in/out tracker, animated progress tracking, and customizable goals, it empowers users to manage their nutrition effectively. Its smooth animations and intuitive layout enhance the overall experience.
